files array retuns all files dropped on DropZone

fileDropzone string Mime file Types | file-dropzone="[image/png, image/jpeg, image/gif]"

//javascript
$scope.images = [];
$scope.fileAdded = function(img) { alert(img.fileName);};
                    
                
<div class="dropzone" file-dropzone="[image/png, image/jpeg, image/gif]" files="images" data-max-file-size="3" file-added="fileAdded">
  <span>Drop Image Here</span>
</div>
<div class="col-sm-3 thumbnail" style="position:relative;height:200px" ng-repeat="img in images">
  <img class="img-responsive" style="position:absolute;top:auto;bottom:auto;vertical-align:middle" ng-src={{img.file}} />
</div>
